title: This video will change ur view on Hamas Attack,
selftext: No support to the attack, but things r really bad in west bank region.
comments: My views of Hamas is the same. There is no need for the world to let it keep existing. Whatever you do in order to make Hamas fall, is justified if reasonably connected.
